solution_line_template: Adam bought {num_sandwiches} sandwiches, so he paid {num_sandwiches} * {price_per_sandwich} = $<<{num_sandwiches}*{price_per_sandwich}={cost_sandwiches}>>{cost_sandwiches} for them.
In total Adam bought products for {cost_water} + {cost_sandwiches} = $<<{cost_water}+{cost_sandwiches}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
